trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Kelso
There were no other sightings in Kelso on or around August 6th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my stiars and i noticed that a firball type orb seemed to come out of the light from the moon, or from behind it. It felt like there was no sound at all in the air, like the sound waves had stoped. the air felt heavy. it was yellowish in the middle, surrounded by a red orange glow. it went so far in such a slow motion. the it flew up and up and up untill i couldnt see it anymore. straight up to the stars.
